title: Provide Wheelchair Assistance
description: An elderly guest arriving at the main entrance requests wheelchair assistance to get to their seat.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the request and ask for the guest's seat location.
Dispatch a guest services staff member with a wheelchair to the guest's location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the task to the nearest available staff member.

tasks.description: Log the assistance request in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a record of the assistance provided.
